pages.text: Meetings & Events Group Gatherings and Celebrations Our Event Venues From board meetings and executive retreats to intimate celebrations, HarbourView Inn offers an inviting venue for meetings and events of every kind. From complimentary WiFi in the guest rooms and meeting spaces to the recently-refreshed Flagship Meeting Room, find all the essential features to make your gathering in downtown Charleston a success. Located steps away at the French Quarter Inn, its 1,105 square feet of handsomely appointed event space features palmetto-inspired art, French chandeliers, and a stately fireplace. Read More Conveniently located in downtown Charleston Frequently Asked Questions How many rooms are considered a "group" to receive a discounted group rate? We offer a discounted group rate to groups of five or more rooms per night. Is there a food and beverage minimum in the meeting rooms? There is no minimum spend for food and beverage in meeting spaces. Is there a restaurant on-site? No, there is no restaurant at the inn itself. However, we are only a few short steps from some of the best restaurants in downtown Charleston. Is there a spa on-site? No, but we are only two blocks from Earthling Day Spa, one of the best spas in downtown Charleston. We can also arrange for certain spa treatments from the comfort of your guest room. Does the meeting space have natural light? It does not. Our meeting room is equipped with artificial lighting. How large is the meeting space? Our on-site meeting space is 546 square feet. For larger groups in need of more space, our sister hotel - French Quarter Inn - offers larger meeting rooms with abundant natural light, as well as a beautiful terrace. French Quarter Inn is just a couple of blocks away, within walking distance. Does the HarbourView Inn do buyouts? Yes, we are happy to offer buyouts of all 52 guest rooms! From Harbour to Historic Completely Reimagined Charming, Southern Hospitality Introducing the newly-renovated HarbourView Inn, an intimate retreat in the heart of historic downtown Charleston that sets the stage for unforgettable adventures. From nighttime milk and cookies to enhanced beverage offerings from the comfort of your guest room, revel in a heartening selection of surprises at this intimate hideaway in the Holy City. About Our Inn top reasons to stay An Exceptional Downtown Location HarbourView Inn offers you premier access to fine dining, shopping, and some of Charleston's best historical attractions. Enhanced Beverage Offerings Indulge in a welcome cocktail, breakfast "eye-opener" and other curated beverages on the terrace, in the lobby, or within your own room. Complimentary Southern Treats Enjoy our continental breakfast, evening wine and cheese reception, and other treats throughout your day. Understated Conveniences for the Understated Traveler Allow us to make your life easier with onsite parking, late checkout, and knowledgeable concierge travel planning. Our Secluded Rooftop Terrace Take in expansive views of the surrounding cityscape and harbor from our private rooftop terrace. Our Dazzling Rooftop Terrace enjoy the view on Venture up and away at HarbourView Inn. From morning until evening, enjoy panoramic views of the city of Charleston from the cloistered respite of our Inn’s rooftop terrace.
